headline: ISRG's Ion Platform Procedure Grows 52%: Can This Trend Continue?
summary: Intuitive Surgical's Ion platform saw Q2 procedures jump 52% to 35,000, expanding globally as utilization rises despite softer system placements.

headline: Intuitive Surgical Has More Room To Grow
summary: Intuitive Surgical's rapid growth and recurring revenue justify its current valuation, making it a valuable investment opportunity. See why ISRG stock is a Buy.
